snippet: Previous iterations of the A-Class, an urban runabout sold outside the United States, resembled miniature minivans. Not so with the new generation, shown Monday night in Geneva.
abstract: Previous iterations of the A-Class, an urban runabout sold outside the United States, resembled miniature minivans. Not so with the new generation, shown Monday night in Geneva.

headline.main: Mercedes-Benz A-Class: Trading Upright for Swept Back
